019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
022import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
023import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
024import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
025import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
026import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
027import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal2;
028import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal3;
029import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
030import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
031import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
032
033import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
034
035@CommandDeclaration(usage = "/plot swap <X;Z>",
036        command = "swap",
037        aliases = {"switch"},
038        category = CommandCategory.CLAIMING,
039        requiredType = RequiredType.PLAYER)
040public class Swap extends SubCommand {
041
042    @Override
043    public CompletableFuture<Boolean> execute(
044            PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args,
045            RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
046            RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
047    ) {
048        Location location = player.getLocation();
049        Plot plot1 = location.getPlotAbs();
050        if (plot1 == null) {
051            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
052            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
053        }
054        if (!plot1.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
055                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN)) {
056            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
057            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
058        }
059        if (args.length != 1) {
060            sendUsage(player);
061            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
062        }
063        Plot plot2 = Plot.getPlotFromString(player, args[0], true);
064        if (plot2 == null) {
065            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
066        }
067        if (plot1.equals(plot2)) {
068            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.origin_cant_be_target"));
069            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
070        }
071        if (!plot1.getArea().isCompatible(plot2.getArea())) {
072            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.plotworld_incompatible"));
073            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
074        }
075        if (plot1.isMerged() || plot2.isMerged()) {
076            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("swap.swap_merged"));
077            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
078        }
079
080        // Set strings here as the plot objects are mutable (the PlotID changes after being moved).
081        String p1 = plot1.toString();
082        String p2 = plot2.toString();
083
084        return plot1.getPlotModificationManager().move(plot2, player, () -> {
085        }, true).thenApply(result -> {
086            if (result) {
087                player.sendMessage(
088                        TranslatableCaption.of("swap.swap_success"),
089                        TagResolver.builder()
090                                .tag("origin", Tag.inserting(Component.text(p1)))
091                                .tag("target", Tag.inserting(Component.text(p2)))
092                                .build()
093                );
094                return true;
095            } else {
096                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("swap.swap_overlap"));
097                return false;
098            }
099        });
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
104        return true;
105    }
106
107}
